content.raw:
I noticed that as well. It appears to be a regression of issue #236, which I thought had been fixed. I updated Sensor_TEST.cc in ffd9585 (branch issue_236_regression) to illustrate the regression and re-opened #236.

It happens because sometimes sensors fail to publish messages for a period of time after world reset. For example, if you Reset World after 10 seconds of simulation, it may take 10 seconds for the sensors to start publishing. See #236 for details.
